Module com.fy916.bubblebobble
Package com.fy916.bubblebobble.utilities

Class GameScores

java.lang.Object
com.fy916.bubblebobble.utilities.GameScores
public class GameScores extends Object
This class includes some utilities that facilitate the control of leader board names and scores, along with saving the current game scores.
Demonstrates Single Responsibility, SINGLETON and FACTORY Design Pattern.
Author:
fy916

    • save_score

      public static int save_score​(String name, int score)
      Static Method to Insert a score and the name into the leaderboard.
      Demonstrates FACTORY Design Pattern. Only if when the score is top10 will be added.
      Parameters:
      name - The name for the player
      score - The score the player gets
      Returns:
      the place of the user

    • addScore

      public static void addScore​(int score)
      Static Method to add the score to the existing score.
      Parameters:
      score - The score to be added to the original score.

    • setScorePlace

      public static void setScorePlace​(int scorePlace)
      Static Method to set the current player place in the leader board.
      Parameters:
      scorePlace - The new place of the user in the leader board

    • resetScore

      public static void resetScore()
      Static Method to reset the user score.
